4. Metadata
Do you not use a metadata standard like ISO19115 for your geospatial data (shapefiles)?
7. Data sharing
Consider depositing your data in a data repository. Pangaea might be a good option (https://www.pangaea.de). Or KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
